item.title: Caprese Chicken Salad
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Grill chicken until cooked through. Slice chicken and arrange on a plate with tomatoes and mozzarella. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with balsamic glaze. Published by – Dulan – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
  • 1 cup fresh mozzarella, diced
  • Fresh basil leaves
  • Balsamic glaze

Instructions

Grill chicken until cooked through. Slice chicken and arrange on a plate with tomatoes and mozzarella. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with balsamic glaze.

Published by

– Dulan –

For chef reviews:

Click here

item.title: Vegetable Curry
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Sauté onions until softened. Add potatoes, cauliflower, carrots, and chickpeas. Stir in coconut milk and curry powder. Simmer until vegetables are tender Published by – Praveen – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 potatoes, diced
  • 1 cup cauliflower florets
  • 1 cup carrots, sliced
  • 1 can chickpeas, drained
  • 1 can coconut milk
  • 2 tablespoons curry powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions

Sauté onions until softened. Add potatoes, cauliflower, carrots, and chickpeas. Stir in coconut milk and curry powder. Simmer until vegetables are tender

Published by

– Praveen –

For chef reviews:

item.title: Salmon with Lemon and Dill Seeds
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Season salmon with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil, top with lemon slices and fresh dill. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes. Published by – Methuja – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 4 salmon fillets
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 lemon, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped
  • Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions

Season salmon with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil, top with lemon slices and fresh dill. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes.

Published by

– Methuja –

For chef reviews:

item.title: Vegetarian Quinoa Stir-fry
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Sauté vegetables in sesame oil until tender. Add cooked quinoa, soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Stir-fry until everything is well combined. Published by – Saymui – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup quinoa, cooked
  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
  • 1/4 cup soy sauce
  • 2 tablespoons sesame oil
  • 1 tablespoon minced ginger
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

Instructions

Sauté vegetables in sesame oil until tender. Add cooked quinoa, soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Stir-fry until everything is well combined.

Published by

– Saymui –

For chef reviews:

item.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Cook pasta according to package instructions. Sauté chicken in olive oil until cooked through. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Pour in heavy cream and Parmesan, stirring until the cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper, and toss with cooked pasta. Published by – Dulan – For chef reviews:...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 8 oz fettuccine pasta
  • 2 chicken breasts, diced
  • 2 cups heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions

Cook pasta according to package instructions. Sauté chicken in olive oil until cooked through. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Pour in heavy cream and Parmesan, stirring until the cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper, and toss with cooked pasta.

Published by

– Dulan –

For chef reviews:

item.title: Chicken Pea and Broth
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Method STEP 1Heat the chicken stock in a pan, then add the rice or pasta and cook until just tender (about 8 minutes). Add the chicken and peas and cook for 1 minute until heated through. Season, stir through the parsley and serve. Published by – Methuja – For chef reviews on this recipe:...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 750ml chicken stock
  • 50g rice or orzo
  • 1 skinless cooked chicken breast, shredded
  • 50g frozen peas, defrosted
  • a small handful flat-leaf parsley, chopped

Method

STEP 1
Heat the chicken stock in a pan, then add the rice or pasta and cook until just tender (about 8 minutes). Add the chicken and peas and cook for 1 minute until heated through. Season, stir through the parsley and serve.

Published by

– Methuja –

For chef reviews on this recipe:

item.title: Gravy
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the butter and let melt. Once the butter is melted, whisk in the flour until well incorporated and cook for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. Next, slowly whisk in the pan drippings until they are all well...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • pan drippings from roasted chicken or 1/4 cup butter
  • 1/4 cup all purpose flour
  • 2 cups chicken stock or broth
  • salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Instructions

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the butter and let melt. Once the butter is melted, whisk in the flour until well incorporated and cook for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. Next, slowly whisk in the pan drippings until they are all well incorporated. Next, slowly pour in the chicken broth, whisking continuously as you pour it in. Give the gravy a taste and season with salt and pepper and let cook for for two to three more minutes until it has thickened to your desired consistency. Once the gravy has thickened to your desired consistency, remove it from the heat. Transfer to a serving dish and serve immediately.

Published by

– Praveen-

For Chef reviews:

item.title: Roast Turkey
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Gather all ingredients. Remove turkey neck and giblets.Loosely fill turkey cavity with stuffing. Pour 2 cups of turkey stock into the roasting pan. Loosely tent turkey with aluminum foil, and roast turkey for 2 1/2 hours, basting with pan juices every 30 minutes. Published by – Methuja – For chef reviews:...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 2 tablespoons dried parsley
  • 2 tablespoons ground dried rosemary
  • 2 tablespoons rubbed dried sage
  • 2 tablespoons dried thyme leaves
  • 1 tablespoon lemon-pepper seasoning
  • 1 tablespoon salt
  • 1 (15 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed
  • 1 medium orange, cut into 8 wedges
  • 1 medium onion, chopped into large pieces
  • 1 medium carrot, cut into 1/2-inch slices
  • 2 stalks celery, cut into 1/2-inch slices
  • 1 (750 milliliter) bottle champagne
  • 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth

Instructions

Gather all ingredients. Remove turkey neck and giblets.Loosely fill turkey cavity with stuffing. Pour 2 cups of turkey stock into the roasting pan. Loosely tent turkey with aluminum foil, and roast turkey for 2 1/2 hours, basting with pan juices every 30 minutes.

Published by

– Methuja –

For chef reviews:

Click here

item.title: Gazpach Sauce Spaghetti
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Method STEP 1Cook the pasta following pack instructions until al dente. STEP 2Meanwhile, put the tomatoes, pepper, garlic and onion into a blender and whizz until completely smooth. Season, then stir in the sherry vinegar and Tabasco. STEP 3Once the pasta is cooked, drain well and toss with the sauce. Tear in...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 160g spaghetti
  • 250g cherry tomatoes
  • 1 green pepper, chopped
  • ½ a clove garlic
  • ½ red onion, roughly chopped
  • 1 tbsp sherry vinegar
  • a good dash Tabasco
  • a small bunch basil

Method

STEP 1
Cook the pasta following pack instructions until al dente.

STEP 2
Meanwhile, put the tomatoes, pepper, garlic and onion into a blender and whizz until completely smooth. Season, then stir in the sherry vinegar and Tabasco.

STEP 3
Once the pasta is cooked, drain well and toss with the sauce. Tear in lots of basil and serve

Published by

– Tharindu –
